## Diff.IJsonDiffOptions.arrayOrderMatters property

If true, treats arrays as ordered lists where position matters. If false, treats arrays as unordered sets.

When `true` (default), array changes are reported by index position: `[1,2,3]` vs `[1,3,2]` shows modifications at indices 1 and 2.

When `false`<!-- -->, arrays are compared as sets: `[1,2,3]` vs `[1,3,2]` may be considered equivalent (simplified unordered comparison).

**Signature:**

```typescript
arrayOrderMatters?: boolean;
```
